title: Miley Cyrus posts racy pic as she leaves little to imagination in mirror selfie

Miley Cyrus has continued her recent penchant for racy selfies with a see-through pic that leaves little to the imagination.

The 26-year-old singer has followed up the posting of a steamy pic with new beau Cody Simpson last week, with a snap that does little to hide her assets in a mirror selfie.

Sharing the pic with her 100 million followers, Miley wore a sheer tank top that flaunted her body to her fans.

She also wore a pair of Daisy Dukes and included a number of other shots in front of the mirror.

Miley then posed with a guitar for a couple of pics in the sunshine, as the daughter of Billy Ray Cyrus gave a nod to his country roots.

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

Captioning the pics, Miley wrote: "I’m getting more basic by the day.

"The only thing the 'new me' loves more than a mirror selfie is a self timed one."

It has been a busy few days for Miley, as she has confirmed her relationship with Australian boyfriend Cody.

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

The mirror was once again the medium as she shared a snap of them together, as they showed off a serious piece of jewellery that more than hinted that their coupling was for real.

In the photo, Cody wore a signet ring which had his initials on it and the the designer of the piece confirmed on social media that it had been made specifically for him.

(Image: Miley Cyrus/Instagram)

Cort Jewellery posted on Monday: "When you wake up and freak out to see @mileycyrus wearing the custom ring you made @codysimpson."

It would seem that Miley's rollercoaster love life is currently climbing the heights once again.
